message: I'd buy an invite from them, but it violates my "no CC info into random web forms" policy ...

hi, do you have an extra invitation, anybody? thanks -> cendako.var@gmail.com

This is an *awesome* portfolio piece and a feather in the developer's cap for sure, but functionally it's ≈100% worthless.  Does anyone believe they'll actually sign into this service more than once or twice?  If the developer or a principal is ITT, can you speak to the use cases you imagine here?

I'm sorry, I think I was just misunderstanding the purpose of the site... I saw it on Dribbble and it looks like it's primarily an exercise in design.  Full marks there!  (I'm not very design inclined so this went over my head at first, I kept looking for the function.)  Lot's to learn about css animations in there. I like it!
Could someone send me an invite? Thanks in advance (smithwilliamjake@gmail.com)
